summary: Added tmux utilities (packages/hive-tui/src/utils/tmux.ts) with isInsideTmux, isTmuxAvailable, spawnTuiPane, closeTuiPane, getManualCommand functions. Added hive_tui tool to opencode-hive that auto-spawns TUI in tmux pane or returns manual command. Updated HIVE_SYSTEM_PROMPT to include TUI tool. Both packages build successfully.
